title: Somalia in the midst of disaster as devastating rains and floods spread
description: Six months after Somalia emerged from a historic drought that pushed the country to the brink of widespread famine, another climate shock has struck as heavy rains and floods batter several areas of the country.
content:
UNOCHA - United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs
